title: Sega Shoot Pack (Dreamcast)
description:
You finished all the games that you could have palyed with a gun ? house of the dead, confidential mission , death crimson 2 et death crimson OX , virtua cop 2, and even the mini game in Demolition racer?
But you want more ?
SO take back you gun!!! 
Thanks to this pack, you will be able to play with tour DC gun, trough the emulators Dreamsnes, Nester, and an homebrew!!!

Contents :

DreamSnes 0.9.8 :
* Super Scope 6 ;
* Battle Clash ;
* Bazooka Blitzkrieg ;
* Lamborghini American Challenge ;
* Metal Combat: Falcon&#039;s Revenge ;
* Terminator 2: The Arcade Game ;
* Tinstar ;
* X-Zone ;
* Yoshi&#039;s Safari.
All the games are in the european, american, and japan versions when it was possible.
Plug the paddle on the port A, and the gun on the port B

Nester 7.1 :
* The Adventures of Bayou Billy
* Baby Boomer
* Barker Bill&#039;s Trick Shooting
* Chiller
* Duck Hunt
* Freedom Force
* Gotcha!
* Gumshoe
* Hogan&#039;s Alley
* Laser Invasion
* The Lone Ranger
* Mechanized Attack
* Operation Wolf
* Shooting Range
* To the Earth
* Track & Field II
* Wild Gunman
And there, plug the gun on the port A, and the paddle on the port B.
It&#039;s an non official version of nester, Warmtoe added the light gun support.

Homebrew: bloop
Always made by Warmtoe, this is a very simple game : you shoot targets. Not very funny alone, it&#039;s more interesting when you play with someone else (up to 4 players !!).
Plug the guns from the right, to the left in order to play ( Port D, then C, B and A)

Ironicly enough, we can see that it&#039;s Nintendo emulators that supports gun, unlike sega ones...

Image type : ".cdi"
Selfboot : yes
